title: France panorama. [No. 70/51]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Education and culture - the Yerres Educational and Cultural Center. 2. Data-processing and youth - the EMD 7000 computer. 3. Wings - the “Falcon 10”. 4. Data-processing and travel - the “Air France” electronic reservation service. 5. Prosper Merimee - Prosper Merimee, inspector-general of historical monuments. 6. The arts - the Young Engravers Salon.
